name: Peka vs Beaver
description:
Small (unfinished) Ludum Dare Jam 32 game. No sound, no art :) Probably the only interesting thing about this game is that it's written in Haskell (and translated into javascript using special compiler - GHCJS). It's like 3rd Haskell game in the whole Ludum Dare history, so yay. Check out the source if you're interested.

An epic battle between Pekas and Beavers is about to begin!

How to play:

  1. Select side (Pekas or Beavers)
  2. Click on the field to spawn your warriors!
  3. Warriors of different sides annihilate each other when they meet.
  4. Warrior flatten out his enemies on landing!
  5. Win by getting more warriors in the enemy castle.

Github
